name: Grall Axy
description:
You are lost in space on a planet threatened by the arrival of comets.

Destroy comets before they destroy your planet, using your special time control ability, or you'll have no place left to call home.

How long will you survive?

Controller is allowed and highly recommended!

------------------------------

Move with left/right arrow or joystick

jump with space or A

Slow time with S or Left Trigger

Accel time with Z or right Trigger

------------------------------

Made for the 38th Ludum Dare, theme "Small World", in less than 72h

Game by :

Ronan CHENU - www.ronan.pro

Morgane MASSON - @morgane_iste

Julien "Mirany" ZAWADKA-PIGOT
